meanings.definition: A refrigerator or fridge is a household appliance used for storing and preserving food at a low temperature.
meanings.sent1: We keep our fruits and vegetables fresh in the fridges.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on fridges this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The fridges at the party were filled with delicious snacks.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a maze of interconnected fridges, each holding a different memory.
meanings.sent5: The hum of the fridges in the kitchen was a comforting background noise.
